title: PewDiePie shows off sweet 30th birthday presents from wife Marzia Kjellberg
text:
The YouTuber celebrated his 30th birthday in style (Pictures: Instagram/PewDiePie)

Marzia Kjellberg has proven she’s wife goals after she treated her husband PewDiePie to some sweet, thoughtful presents on his 30th birthday.

The YouTube star, who currently boasts a following of more than 100 million, had a low-key day, celebrating with his partner and their close friends.

Showing off his haul of gifts on Instagram, he snapped a photo of a box laden with snacks, sweets and drinks, writing: ‘Mertz got me ma Swedish snacks.’

Later posting a video of his new foldy phone (that’s the technical term, right?) he gushed: ‘Epic gift, thank you mertzia.’

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Of course, the pups Edgar and Maya couldn’t be left out, as they penned a card for the YouTuber, writing: ‘Happy birthday Felix! We think you are really cool sometimes. Edgar and Maya. P.s. ples share gift with us.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

The pair went on to have a chill night with YouTube pals JackSepticEye and KickThePJ, with Felix posting some snaps of some very boozy gifts.

To top off the day, Tommy Wiseau had a birthday message for Pewds, adapting a shot from The Room to include Felix’s face, and writing: ‘Make the years in front of you matter!’

Marzia got hold of some Swedish snacks for the milestone birthday (Picture: Instagram/pewdiepie)

Wise(au) words there. We’ll see ourselves out.

The couple, who also recently celebrated Marzia’s 27th birthday by getting matching tattoos, recently returned from their second honeymoon to Japan, which was where they got engaged back in 2018.

However, despite jetting off and having a whole lot to celebrate, Felix proved that the hustle never stops by hitting 100 million subscribers soon after his and Marzia’s wedding.

Unboxing his custom plaque (which has only been earned by T-Series and PewDiePie as of yet) in a video, he looked pretty close to tearing up about the milestone.

‘I know a lot of people wanted a custom reward, but I don’t care,’ he smiled. ‘This is awesome. And of course, thank you YouTube. Where would I be without you?’

The star went on to remind people to subscribe, adding: ‘We’re trying to hit a thousand million. Is that a billion? Oh my god. Let’s get it. We have to beat…nah I’m just kidding.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

We wouldn’t even put it past him.

description: PewDiePie shows off sweet 30th birthday presents from wife Marzia Kjellberg after wedding and holiday to Japan.
